sql-select.name: GetTablesWithMissingForeignKeys
Missing Foreign Keys
sql-select.description: Find all columns that end in ID but not included in a foreign key relationship
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSC.[name] AS [ColumnName] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] tSC ON tSC.[id] = tSO.[id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[sysforeignkeys] tSFK_1 ON tSFK_1.[rkeyid] = tSO.[id] AND tSFK_1.[rkey] = tSC.[colid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[sysforeignkeys] tSFK_2 ON tSFK_2.[fkeyid] = tSO.[id] AND tSFK_2.[fkey] = tSC.[colid] LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tSI.[id] AS [id] ,tSIK.[colid] AS [colid] FROM [dbo].[sysindexes] tSI INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysindexkeys] tSIK ON tSIK.[id] = tSI.[id] AND tSIK.[indid] = tSI.[indid] WHERE (tSI.[status] & 0x800) > 0 ) tSIC ON tSIC.[id] = tSO.[id] AND tSIC.[colid] = tSC.[colid] WHERE tSO.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND ( tSC.[name] LIKE '%id' OR tSC.[name] LIKE '%[_]id' OR tSC.[name] LIKE 'id%' OR tSC.[name] LIKE '[_]id%' OR tSC.[name] LIKE '%[_]id[_]%' ) AND tSFK_1.[constid] IS NULL AND tSFK_2.[constid] IS NULL AND tSIC.[id] IS NULL GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ,tSC.[name] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSC.[name] ;
